Methods

contains

  • contains(param: any, tol?: number): boolean

  • Check if a bbox or a Point (Vector3) is inside this (not strict)

    Parameters

    • param: any

      Either a BBox or a Vector3

    • tol: number = 0

      The tolerence for the test

    Returns boolean
